belongs_to_collection.name: The Animated Stories from the Bible

overview: When the Israelite Naomi and her two Gentile daughters-in-law, Orpah and Ruth, are left as widows, Naomi begs them to return to their own people.  Orpah agrees, but Ruth declares she will never forsake Naomi and accompanies her mother-in-law back to Israel.  Her faithfulness is rewarded when Naomiâ€™s kinsman, Boaz, falls in love with Ruth and marries her.
title: Ruth

titles.title: Animated Stories from the Bible - Ruth
